Package sait.frms.exception

package sait.frms.exception
  • Exceptions
    Class
    Description
    EmptyFieldException
    This exception will be thrown if user tries to make or update a reservation with some fields being empty
    InvalidAirLineException
    This exception is thrown when a valid airline cannot be parse from the flight code.
    InvalidCitizenshipException
    Thrown when citizenship is empty or null
    InvalidFlightException
    Thrown if flight doesnt exist or invalid.
    InvalidNameException
    Thrown when Name field is empty or null
    NoSeatsLeftException
    This exception is thrown when a user tries to make a reservation for a flight with 0 seats available.
